courses.title: Beginner Guitar Course
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing guitar, including chords, strumming, and simple songs.

courses.title: Piano for Beginners
courses.description: A step-by-step introduction to piano playing, music theory, and reading sheet music.

courses.title: Advanced Vocal Training
courses.description: Improve your vocal range, technique, and performance skills.

courses.title: Music Production with Ableton Live
courses.description: Learn how to produce professional-quality tracks using Ableton Live.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation
courses.description: Explore the theory and practice of jazz improvisation for various instruments.
